Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.geometry.planar

Class IntDirection

java.lang.Object
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.geometry.planar.Direction
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.geometry.planar.IntDirection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Direction>
public class IntDirection extends Direction implements Serializable
Implements an abstract class Direction as an equivalence class of IntVector's.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Direction p_other_direction)
      Implements the Comparable interface. Returns 1, if this direction has a strict bigger angle with the positive x-axis than p_other_direction, 0, if this direction is equal to p_other_direction, and -1 otherwise. Throws an exception, if p_other_direction is not a Direction.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Direction>
